work_areas.title: Triage
work_areas.description: Identify and prioritize bugs to fix

work_areas.title: Fix & Verify
work_areas.description: Fix each bug and verify the fix

packets.title: Collect and document all bugs
packets.scope: Gather all bugs to fix. Document each: description, reproduction steps, severity, affected area. Output: bugs.md

packets.title: Prioritize and sequence
packets.scope: Order bugs by priority. Consider: severity, dependencies between fixes, risk. Update bugs.md with priority order.

packets.title: Fix bug batch 1 (critical)
packets.scope: Fix highest priority bugs. For each: reproduce, find root cause, fix, add regression test, verify fix. Commit each fix separately.

packets.title: Fix bug batch 2 (high)
packets.scope: Fix next priority bugs. Same process: reproduce, root cause, fix, test, verify. Commit separately.

packets.title: Fix bug batch 3 (medium/low)
packets.scope: Fix remaining bugs. Same process. May include 'nice to fix' items if time allows.

packets.title: Full regression test
packets.scope: Run complete test suite. Manual testing of fixed areas. Verify no new bugs introduced.

packets.title: Update bug tracker and docs
packets.scope: Close fixed bugs in tracker. Document any known issues remaining. Update changelog if applicable.
